file_content.text: Darth Viktus awaits you at the Panteer hideaway.
My lord? Lieutenant Muir. The matter is dealt with.
Excellent. Yet more proof that the servants of the Empire are capable of any task. I'll see to it that you receive your due rewards.
Perfect. The Empire is fortunate to have such a capable servant. This accomplishment will be well rewarded.
Thank you, my lord.
You have served the Empire well, but there is more yet to be done.
What's next?
Then I'm done here.
So long as enemies remain to be crushed, the Empire's work is never done.
I am currently engaged in negotiations with the Panteer survivors at their mountain hideaway. I will arrange for you to be allowed inside.
Be sure to conduct yourself... cautiously. The Panteer hideaway is neutral soil. They won't tolerate uncalled-for aggression.
One obstacle still stands before our plans for House Thul: Bouris Ulgo, the supposed "king" of Alderaan himself. We'll speak more when you arrive.
Farewell, my lord.
Farewell, agent.
Farewell.
Welcome back. Probes have confirmed the full elimination of Ulgo's strike teams. I will contact Darth Viktus immediately.
I will contact Darth Viktus as soon as the mission is complete.
My lord, please stand by a moment. I have urgent orders to put you into contact with my superior, Darth Viktus.
Ah. So you've finally arrived. I've been told that you've accomplished much for the Empire during your service to Darth Baras.
Ah. You've arrived, finally. I'm told that you've served Darth Zash well in your time as her apprentice.
I am Darth Viktus. Our Empire has need of you, Sith--here and now.
I live to serve, my lord.
Of course.
I would be pleased to do whatever you require, my lord.
Gladly.
Agent. I am ordered by my superior, Darth Viktus, to place you into direct contact with him at once. Please stand by.
Ah, Cipher Nine. I've heard much about you. Your record of service to the Empire is most impressive.
I am Darth Viktus. I am granting you the opportunity to serve your Empire even further--immediately.
I am always honored to serve the Empire, my lord.
Of course.
Hold up, bounty hunter. I have orders from my superior, Darth Viktus, to place you into contact with him immediately. Don't go anywhere.
Ah. Lieutenant Muir finally caught up with you. I imagine it comes as no surprise that your... activities have not escaped the Empire's notice.
I am Darth Viktus. Today, you have the opportunity to perform a great service to the Empire. This service will reap plentiful rewards. Do you accept this opportunity?
Somebody's got to reap those plentiful rewards--might as well be me.
Count me in.
Hold up, there. I am commanded by my superior, Darth Viktus, to inform him immediately upon your arrival. Please stand by.
You. The Empire would like to offer you an opportunity to serve its interests on Alderaan. Immediately.
Surely I would be a preferable agent for this task, my lord.
Leave this to me.
Couldn't a fellow Sith deal with this, my lord?
Let me handle it.
Will the Empire be compensating us for our time and expertise?
What's the pay?
The rewards for dutiful service are always generous.
I'm an agent of Imperial Intelligence, my lord. I would be proud to be of assistance.
I could help in this.
Your participation would be most welcome.
What exactly is needed?
I can't help you right now.
It would be... unwise to ignore the opportunity to serve the Empire's interests.
The task at hand involves House Panteer--the weakened former rulers of Alderaan. Though most believe them wiped out, a few stragglers yet survive.
These surviving Panteers are needed to legitimize House Thul's eventual rule. We are creating an understanding with them even now, but the forces of House Ulgo plan to interfere.
How can I serve the Empire in this matter, my lord?
Just tell me what to do.
Why are the Ulgos so concerned about House Thul?
What is Ulgo's interest?
Bouris Ulgo, House Ulgo's leader, was a Republic war criminal before he usurped Alderaan's throne. His hatred of the Empire is well known.
Not exactly exciting stuff.
Your amusement is not my concern.
Ulgo has strike teams massing thranta for transport. They intend to assault the Panteers' mountain hideaway and slaughter all surviving members of the house.
The eradication of House Panteer would greatly impede our plans for House Thul's ascendance--it cannot be allowed. You will find the Ulgo strike teams and destroy them at once.
Of course.
Ulgo's men will be eradicated.
I would accept nothing less.
When it is done, report back to Lieutenant Muir. We will continue our discussion then. Farewell.
Maybe I will, maybe I won't.
It would be best if you kept the interests of the Empire foremost in your priorities. Report back to Lieutenant Muir when you have done as you should.
Good luck.
Please excuse me. I have Imperial business to attend to.
